---

## Usage

**Grade for this unit:** `100%` Epitech's tests passed.

Close the repo

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Leorevoir/Nm-Objdump.git
```

Install dependencies packages with Nix

```nix
nix develop
```

Build the project

```bash
make
```

Execute the binaries !

```bash
./my_nm --help
./my_objdump --help
```

## Unit-Tests

Run unit-tests

```bash
make tests_run
```
